basics.name: David Lozano Jarque
basics.label: Full stack software engineer: from scratch to production
basics.summary: Turning ideas into code is my passion: I've been developing software since I was in elementary school. First as a hobby, then as a freelance, and eventually in a company. Overall, my mission is to provide valuable contributions to great projects that can make a difference in their users' lifes

work.name: Open-sourcing & freelancing
work.summary: Took a planned break from corporate work to focus on deepening technical knowledge in areas previously limited by time constraints during full-time roles. Explored topics such as semantic release, in-depth Angular, JavaScript/Typescript bundling optimizations and the maintenance of open source (npm) libraries. Complemented technical growth with learning on team culture and engineering management, reading several key books on leadership and collaboration.
highlights: Created an open-source library for Angular for managing meta tags: [@davidlj95/ngx-meta](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@davidlj95/ngx-meta)
Built a [responsive fashion stylist portfolio](https://christianlazaro.es) featuring optimized image delivery via multiple CDN providers

Contributed to open source projects through many [pull requests](https://github.com/pulls?q=author%3A%40me+-user%3A%40me+created%3A%3E2023-05-15) and [issues](https://github.com/search?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Adavidlj95+-user%3Adavidlj95&type=issues&s=created&o=desc). Plus other kinds of [public contributions](https://www.notion.so/davidlj95/9f766c2fe57e4a9ebf0bc571b62ec446?v=9db04a3147ec4323883403873a13c05d&pvs=4)
Designed and launched a [personal website](https://davidlj95.com) on the internet

work.name: Vesto
work.summary: Backend: web APIs and background processing. Led, engineered and assisted many product features. Planned robustness proposal to improve the app stability by reducing error rates. Focusing on gaining observability to push for data-driven decisions. Optimized processes to reduce customer support workload
highlights: Led initiative to observe & reduce wallet synchronization issues from 69% to 6%
Built direct batch buy feature to buy multiple stocks at once

Produced continuous proposals to improve company's processes. Backend team side and company wide. For instance pushing for technical refinements, differentiating between bugs and complaints or tracking estimations accuracy
Introduced 'learning fridays' to enable knowledge sharing amongst engineering team
Implemented New Relic as observability tool

work.name: Koa Health
work.summary: Full stack: web APIs backend, web app and mobile app. Led, engineered and assisted several features. Coordinated with product, design, QA, DevOps, cybersecurity, research & other products' engineering teams. Enhanced the company's design system library. Supported several squad's processes improvements
highlights: Started as mid. Promoted to senior in 1st year's performance review
Led some features: audio exercises, push notifications in mobile app. Messaging in web and mobile app. For the Mindset product
Maintained backend infrastructure collaborating with DevOps team
Maintained CI/CD pipelines
Handled many authZ/N features. Created proof of concept of Single Sign On (SSO) by federating with 3rd party identity providers using AWS Cognito
Assisted company spin off by programmatically setting up new email signatures for all employees

work.name: BTC Assessors
work.summary: Full stack: web apps and peer to peer / web API backends. Lead software engineer for all company's projects. Blockchain / DLT consultant and researcher. Board member of the company's own cryptocurrency investment fund as technical advisor
highlights: Headed many software development projects in the company. For instance a Bitcoin library and wallet and a verifiable credentials platform
Advised technically our customers about Bitcoin, blockchain or DLT technologies
Spoke in several talks about Bitcoin and blockchain technologies
Facilitated software project management

work.name: SEAT
work.summary: Organized integration of IBC Biomechanics software within SEAT IT systems. In order to be used for its internal biomechanical laboratory in the CARS center inside Martorell headquarters

work.name: Meditrauma
work.summary: Administered IT systems and infrastructure of each of the three company branches. Performing systems administration tasks and general IT consultancy
highlights: Maintained local and wireless area networks and its devices. Including cybersecurity tasks such as traffic filtering
Operated company's servers: shared file systems management via Samba, Microsoft SQL / Borland (BDE) databases. Data backups
Maintained network printers and scanners
Maintained workstations: company software management, endpoint protection and permissions management
Maintained labor risk prevention and medical equipment hardware and services. Like audiometers, X-Ray machines and ECGs

work.name: IBC Biomechanics
work.summary: Developed a reporting application. Created several proofs of concept apps to connect to biomechanical devices using Bluetooth. Managed the IT systems of the company
highlights: Accelerated reporting process. From a manual process taking hours into an automatic process taking seconds
Conducted several tests to develop in-house biomechanical data capture and processing software. To remove third party software dependencies and provide a holistic study experience
Managed and maintained company's IT infrastructure: workstations, office software, endpoint protection and backups

awards.title: 2nd place at University degree's gamification program
awards.summary: 'TOP Enginyeria' is an engineering gamification program implemented in several engineering degrees that aims students to go further than classes with extra projects,  competitions, challenges and games apart from traditional classes, awarding the best students with symbolic rewards and extra activities to motivate them in their studies and improve their rivalry to get the best performance possible
